body:
## Expected Behavior
Workflow reset should only create a new history tree for new workflow once

## Actual Behavior
Workflow reset try to create new history tree 2+ times

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. run TestIntegrationSuite/TestResetWorkflow

## Specifications

  - Version: master
  - Platform: N/A
title: Workflow reset try to create new history tree 2+ times
